fields.name: mc
fields.title: Measure Count
fields.description: Running count of encoded <Measure> tags which do not necessarily express a full measure (e.g. in case of an anacrusis).

fields.name: mn
fields.title: Measure Number
fields.description: Measure number as printed in the score, computed from mc, dont_count and numbering_offset.

fields.name: quarterbeats
fields.title: Offset from Beginning
fields.description: Distance of an event from the piece's beginning. By default, only second endings are taken into account to reflect the proportions of a simply playthrough without repeats.

fields.name: quarterbeats_all_endings
fields.title: Offset from Beginning (Including Endings)
fields.description: Distance from the piece's beginning, taking all endings into account for addressability purposes.

fields.name: duration_qb
fields.title: Duration in ♩
fields.description: A float corresponding to duration * 4

fields.name: mc_onset
fields.title: Offset within Encoded Measure
fields.description: Distance of an event from the beginning of the <Measure> tag.

fields.name: mn_onset
fields.title: Offset within Logical Measure
fields.description: Distance from the beginning of the logical measure. Relevant, for example, to compute the metric position of an event.

fields.name: timesig
fields.title: Time Signature
fields.description: Given as string, e.g. "4/4".

fields.name: staff
fields.title: Staff
fields.description: Number of the staff where an event occurs, 1 designating the top staff.

fields.name: voice
fields.title: Notational Layer
fields.description: A number between 1-4 where 1 is MuseScore's default layer (blue), 2 the second layer in green with downward stems, etc.

fields.name: label
fields.title: Label
fields.description: String corresponding to the entire annotation label.

fields.name: globalkey
fields.title: Global Key
fields.description: The key of the entire piece as note name, lowercase designating a minor key.

fields.name: localkey
fields.title: Local Key
fields.description: The key that a Roman numeral is relative to, expressed as a Roman numeral relative to the global key.

fields.name: pedal
fields.title: Pedal Point
fields.description: Specified as Roman numeral.

fields.name: chord
fields.title: Chord
fields.description: The part of an annotation label that corresponds to the actual chord label.

fields.name: numeral
fields.title: Roman Numeral
fields.description: The Roman numeral part of a DCML label, lowercase for all chords with a minor third.

fields.name: figbass
fields.title: Chord Inversion
fields.description: 7, 65, 43, 2, 64, 6 or empty for root position.

fields.name: changes
fields.title: Changes
fields.description: Alterations, suspensions, additions, and omissions, written within parentheses in the chord label.

fields.name: relativeroot
fields.title: Relative Root
fields.description: The Roman numeral following the / in applied chords. Can itself include a /. For example, V/V if the label pertains to the major scale on the second scale degree.

fields.name: cadence
fields.title: Cadence
fields.description: PAC, IAC, EC, DC, PC, HC, and HC subtypes such as HC.SIM

fields.name: phraseend
fields.title: Phrase Annotation
fields.description: The phrase annotation part of a DCML label, can be {, }, or }{. In an older version, the only label was \\

fields.name: globalkey_is_minor
fields.title: Global Key is Minor
fields.description: Boolean that is 1 if the piece is in minor and 0 if it is in major.

fields.name: localkey_is_minor
fields.title: Local Key is Minor
fields.description: Boolean that is 1 if the local key is minor and 0 if it is major.

fields.name: chord_tones
fields.title: Chord Tones
fields.description: Tones expressed by the label, as fifth intervals relative to the local tonic.

fields.name: added_tones
fields.title: Added Tones
fields.description: Chord tones considered as added, expressed as fifth intervals relative to the local tonic.

fields.name: root
fields.title: Root
fields.description: Pertaining to MuseScore encoding.

fields.name: bass_note
fields.title: Bass Note
fields.description: Loweste note designated by the chord label, expressed as fifth intervals relative to the local tonic.

creator.name: ms3
creator.description: A parser for MuseScore 3 files and data factory for annotated music corpora.
